title.narrative: Integrated Emergency WASH Response in Abyan-Yemen

description.narrative: The project will provide access to the basic water, sanitation and hygiene promotion services, this will be done through construction of new and/or rehabilitation of existing water supply facilities by installing water distribution networks, fittings boreholes and wells with pumps and generators, establishment and capacity building of water management committees, communities training on best hygiene practices, in addition to support communities to construct sanitation facilities.
